$:/core/templates/single.tiddler.window.text:
<$set name="themeTitle" value={{$:/view}}>

<$set name="tempCurrentTiddler" value=<<currentTiddler>>>

<$set name="currentTiddler" value={{$:/language}}>

<$set name="languageTitle" value={{!!name}}>

<$set name="currentTiddler" value=<<tempCurrentTiddler>>>

<$importvariables filter="[[$:/core/ui/PageMacros]] [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Macro]!has[draft.of]]">

<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList" singleTiddlerMode="yes">

<$transclude mode="block"/>

</$navigator>

</$importvariables>

</$set>

</$set>

</$set>

</$set>

</$set>
